      void ObminusValue() 
      void OKOnEnter()
      Mouse MoveOn and MoveExit Action for switch controller and OK button When move on button, change the color of text to yellow and add shadow to the button.

    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        initialize the setting page.

      • BgColorSwitch

        public void BgColorSwitch()
        Switch the color for the background. Eight color can be chosen.

      • ObColorSwitch

        public void ObColorSwitch()
        Switch the color for the obstacle. Eight color can be chosen.

      • DifSwitch

        public void DifSwitch()
        Switch the difficulty of the game Three difficulty can be chosen.

      • GhostSwitch

        public void GhostSwitch()
        Switch the ghost number of the game. Ghost number can be chosen from three to five.

      • SetImage

        public void SetImage()
        Set the image of preview

      • BgAddValue

        public void BgAddValue()
        the switch controller for the selection of color and difficulty. the left button to click is to select previous color/difficulty. the right button to click is to select next color/difficulty.

      • BgminusValue

        public void BgminusValue()

      • ObAddValue

        public void ObAddValue()

        public void GhostMinusValue()

      • GhostAddValue

        public void GhostAddValue()

      • confirm

        public void confirm()
        OnAction for OK button When clicked, close the setting interface and show the start interface.

      • OKOnEnter

        public void OKOnEnter()
        Mouse MoveOn and MoveExit Action for switch controller and OK button When move on button, change the color of text to yellow and add shadow to the button.

        public void OKOnExit()
